name: Breaking Digital and Physical Tracking
description: Methods to evade digital surveillance and physical pursuit in high-threat environments.

cards.title: Neutralizing Digital Surveillance
cards.description: Defeating AI-powered tracking and biometric identification systems.
bulletpoints: Disabling or spoofing facial recognition technology.
Blocking GPS and mobile signal tracking methods.

cards.title: Disrupting Physical Pursuit and Tracking
cards.description: Tactics for evading live pursuit and removing tracking devices.
bulletpoints: Detecting and disabling RFID and GPS implants.
Using environmental factors to erase movement traces.
Deploying counter-tracking maneuvers to mislead pursuers.

cards.title: Defeating Predictive Tracking AI
bulletpoints: Altering travel patterns to prevent predictive modeling.
Using decoy digital footprints to misdirect analysts.
